body:
So I was bored, and tried a test recording with OBS. It actually wasn't super laggy! So I played a bit and yeaahh. I'm awkward. And sleepy. It's pretty cringe-ee. I can feel myself being judged. OHWELL

Here it is: https://youtu.be/E_plB5psg-A

title: Playing DTM badly

replies.body: See, I normally get around 60-100 fps (My Wal-mart computer isn't the best xD) but it spikes a lot, and most recording programs lag me into the ground. But OBS is a kind fellow. I couldn't really tell I was recording with it.
